head.supplied: 13/3/79 ¶ ¶ Allow me, dear Sir Redmond, to offer to the trustees of the publ. Library ten copies of my enlarged English Edition of Dr Wittsteins organic-chemical constituents of plants. ¶ I send thi...

div.p: VPRS 5831/PO/8, correspondence inward — miscellaneous letters, pp. 56-7, VA 912 Trustees of the Public Library, Museums and National Gallery of Victoria 1869-1944, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Allow me, dear Sir Redmond, to offer to the trustees of the publ. Library ten copies of my enlarged English Edition of Dr Wittsteins organic-chemical constituents of plants.
Wittstein (1878), i.e. B78.06.09. I send this little contribution in acknowledgement of the continued generous aid, experiences by you & and your cotrustees in the furtherance of my researches through the aid of your noble Library, thinking also that thus I may offer some little help for your interchanges abroad. The work is my own property, being brought out entirely at my private expense; I am this quite free to furnish additional copies should it be desired — of course in such case gratuitously.
